sub_title: Partnerships Manager at JA Alumni Europe | Social Media & Community manager - IEO | BA University Student
summary: As a Business Student, I possess a diverse skill set and a strong passion for international experience. My background in economics and education programs, communications, and media has allowed me to effectively communicate and collaborate with individuals from diverse backgrounds. Moreover, my extensive experience in volunteering and community creation has strengthened my team spirit and leadership abilities. Driven by a desire to make a positive impact on society, I continuously seek innovative and creative solutions to drive meaningful change. I am committed to contributing to a dynamic organization that values teamwork and effective communication in achieving its goals.

awards.title: Exceptional Performance Award
awards.issuer: Athens University of Economics and Business

awards.title: Participation Award
awards.description:
Program name: ''Shadow a business Tribe for a day''

Qualification through a personal letter that was attached to my application for participation.

Navigation and explanation of how such a company is organized, how it works and how their employees collaborate. Had the chance to ask questions and get advice on career topics.

awards.title: Success Award
awards.description:
3rd place in the national economics competition & qualification for the International Economics Olympiad 2020 
Examined in:
  -micro & macro economics
  -history of economics
  -finance management
  -marketing 
  -behavioral economics
awards.issuer: University of Thessaly: Department of Economics

awards.title: Participation Award
awards.description:
Participation in the International Economics Olympiad in 2020.
Examined in:
  -Economics questions Test
  -Financial Literacy Game
  -Business Case Analysis
https://2020.ecolymp.org/

awards.title: Junior Achievement ''Create your own company'' program, 2nd national place
awards.description:
Creation of the student company ''Kinesis'', a company that provides solutions for environmental problems and more specifically, created a control system for traffic lights. Using this system, we could:
  -reduce waste time on the roads
  -reduce health and environment threatening fumes
  -elevate the quality of life in the crowded cities

It was a group project in which we had to decide on an innovative solution-oriented idea, develop and built the product or service we choose, write an appropriate Business Plan and accordingly promote and present the whole project and analysis it to the public. 
''Kinesis'' qualified for the final round among other 9 teams from all over Greece and was asked once again to present the idea to the Jurys. 
We ended up taking the second (2nd) national award.

certifications.name: Financial Times x Bocconi University Talent program

projects.title: Winter Challenge 2023
projects.description:
Contribution in the organization and execution of the International Economics project inspired by IEOx members and the alumni of the International Economics Olympiad. 
-Worked along side talented and curious people that wanted to give others the experience they had lived themselves the previous years. 
-Promotion planning
-Communications & Emails management
-Presentations & Agenda checks
-Participants and Institutions approach and communications

The Winter Challenge is an economics competition based on the model of the International Economic Olympiad, with more than 1000 participants from all over the world this year. It was created by IEOx members and it is an online international competition in which the participants are tested in:
 -the Economics multiple choice test
 -the Financial Literacy Game
 -the Business Case analysis

contributors.headline: Partnerships Manager at JA Alumni Europe | Social Media & Community manager - IEO | BA University Student
Student at Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (AUTH) | Operations & Creativity Manager in WinterChallenge IEOx

projects.title: UoM Business Game 2022
projects.description:
UoM Business Game 2022, was a two-day project introduced to students by UoM Finance club. Participants like me had the chance to work in teams on 3 different business cases from:
-the National Bank of Greece
-Deloitte
-VRS
analyze data, conduct market and sector research, come up with, develop and present their ideas to the judges.

profile_positions.description: The JA Alumni community is creating legacy, continuity, establishing common ground and strengthening their passion for entrepreneurship among young entrepreneurs throughout Europe. My Volunteer work as a Partnerships Manager, focuses on maintaining on-going and exploring new partnership opportunities for the network.
profile_positions.title: Partnerships Manager

profile_positions.description:
The JA Alumni community is creating legacy, continuity, establishing common ground and strengthening their passion for entrepreneurship among young entrepreneurs throughout Europe. My Volunteer work as a Country Coordinator, focuses on:
-Developing & maintaining communication with country representatives
-Supporting country networks in developing a plan and achieving their team's goals
-Facilitating in growing the network & connecting the alumni
-Participation in weekly, monthly and other online and on-site team meetings
-Strategic planning & team/individual project management 
-Plan implementation
-Tracking progress & benchmarks
profile_positions.title: Country Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing the online presence and fostering a sense of community among the IEO's global audience.

-Developing social media campaigns and engaging with the audience on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook and YouTube
-Content creation & Strategic planning
-Alumni Community management/communications
-Lectures and activities planning and hosting
profile_positions.title: Social Media & Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
-Customer communication & needs based provided services
-Team work
-Communication with suppliers
-Cash desk management
profile_positions.title: Retail Manager
